name: @touchspin/jquery
description: jQuery adapter for TouchSpin using standalone adapter
author: TouchSpin Contributors

scripts.build: yarn run build:deps && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/umd && yarn run build:types && yarn run build:js && yarn run build:umd-bootstrap3 && yarn run build:umd-bootstrap4 && yarn run build:umd-bootstrap5 && yarn run build:umd-tailwind && yarn run build:umd-vanilla
scripts.build:umd-bootstrap3: tsup src/bootstrap3.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryBootstrap3 --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/bootstrap3.global.js dist/umd/jquery.touchspin-bootstrap3
scripts.build:umd-bootstrap4: tsup src/bootstrap4.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryBootstrap4 --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/bootstrap4.global.js dist/umd/jquery.touchspin-bootstrap4
scripts.build:umd-bootstrap5: tsup src/bootstrap5.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryBootstrap5 --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/bootstrap5.global.js dist/umd/jquery.touchspin-bootstrap5
scripts.build:umd-tailwind: tsup src/tailwind.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryTailwind --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/tailwind.global.js dist/umd/jquery.touchspin-tailwind
scripts.build:umd-vanilla: tsup src/vanilla.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryVanilla --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/vanilla.global.js dist/umd/jquery.touchspin-vanilla
scripts.build:umd-release-bootstrap3: tsup src/bootstrap3.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryBootstrap3 --no-dts --minify --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/bootstrap3.global.js dist/umd/jquery.touchspin-bootstrap3
scripts.build:umd-release-bootstrap4: tsup src/bootstrap4.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryBootstrap4 --no-dts --minify --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/bootstrap4.global.js dist/umd/jquery.touchspin-bootstrap4
scripts.build:umd-release-bootstrap5: tsup src/bootstrap5.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryBootstrap5 --no-dts --minify --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/bootstrap5.global.js dist/umd/jquery.touchspin-bootstrap5
scripts.build:umd-release-tailwind: tsup src/tailwind.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryTailwind --no-dts --minify --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/tailwind.global.js dist/umd/jquery.touchspin-tailwind
scripts.build:umd-release-vanilla: tsup src/vanilla.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryVanilla --no-dts --minify --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/rename-umd.mjs dist/umd/vanilla.global.js dist/umd/jquery.touchspin-vanilla
scripts.build:test: yarn run build:deps:test && node ../../../scripts/guard-prod-build.mjs packages/adapters/standalone && tsc -p tsconfig.testbuild.json && tsup src/bootstrap3.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryBootstrap3 --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/jquery/umd --external=none && tsup src/bootstrap4.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryBootstrap4 --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/jquery/umd --external=none && tsup src/bootstrap5.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryBootstrap5 --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/jquery/umd --external=none && tsup src/tailwind.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryTailwind --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/jquery/umd --external=none && tsup src/vanilla.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQueryVanilla --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir ../../../devdist/adapters/jquery/umd --external=none && node ../../../scripts/extract-framework-assets.mjs --renderer jquery --dest ../../../devdist/adapters/jquery && node ../../../scripts/write-artifacts-manifest.mjs --dir ../../../devdist/adapters/jquery umdBootstrap3Entry=umd/bootstrap3.global.js umdBootstrap4Entry=umd/bootstrap4.global.js umdBootstrap5Entry=umd/bootstrap5.global.js umdTailwindEntry=umd/tailwind.global.js umdVanillaEntry=umd/vanilla.global.js
scripts.test: node ../../../scripts/pre-test.mjs packages/adapters/jquery/tests && cd ../../.. && playwright test packages/adapters/jquery/tests/
